headline: Duke Energy Offers $200,000 in Grants To Help Nonprofits That Support Senior Citizens in South Carolina
summary: * Qualifying nonprofits can request one-time funding up to $10,000* Grants are a continuation of assistance to senior programs in recent yearsGREENVILLE, S.C. - Duke Energy today launched a campaign...

headline: New voluntary solar program helps Duke Energy customers in North Carolina, South Carolina support clean energy
summary: Clean Energy Connection subscribers can earn monthly bill credits for solar energy generated by participation, without installing solar panels  CHARLOTTE, N.C., Jan. 16, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Duke...
